asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling portrait of a carnival ghost. It has either green or deathly white flesh, with rotting skin hanging from its bones. Its eyes, set in sunken cheekbones, glow with an eerie yellow light. It is wearing tattered, old-fashioned clothing and reaching towards the viewer. The scene is illuminated by flickering torchlight, creating a terrifying atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes its decayed state and glowing eyes.

Its eyes, set in sunken cheekbones, glow with an eerie yellow light. It is wearing tattered, old-fashioned clothing and reaching towards the viewer.
